title: Travel package booking confirmations (all-inclusive)
dataVerified: Traveler names, destination, dates, inclusions, price, tour operator, booking ref
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake travel packages. Domain binding verifies tour operator. Package terms verification (all-inclusive coverage). Cancellation policy evidence. Multi-page: Package agreements multi-page with detailed inclusions.
